changeSet.author: Venkatesh, Supriya
changeSet.comment: Adding Concepts for Patient History Form

changeSet.author: Venkatesh, Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Positive VIA results","Cancer treatment","Supportive services","Cancer suspect","Cancer follow-up","Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "PH, Reason for referral");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to PH, Reason for referral
